Topic.Title: Hiding the message box and the panes for a given room?

Posts.EditableText: How can I hide the msgBox and the panes for a given room which serves as an intro to the game with no interaction from the player?
Posts.HTML: How can I hide the msgBox and the panes for a given room which serves as an intro to the game with no interaction from the player?

Posts.EditableText:
You can show and hide the panes using:
* `JS.panesVisible (false)`
and
* `JS.panesVisible (true)`

This both disables the panes and adjusts the screen size to make them fit.
